name: Amelia
fortune: The spirits of persuasion smile upon you. You’ll close a million-dollar deal — with a chatbot pretending to be real.

name: Arif
fortune: The crystal ball gazes into the loops of time… and the loops gaze back. Your future holds infinite loops both in code and in meetings.

name: Ayub
fortune: You will inherit a backlog that is older than the stars

name: Cynthia
fortune: The moon reveals a restless backlog, whispering your name. It achieves sentience — yet refuses to be prioritized.

name: Ramin
fortune: I hear the cries of tickets unanswered, echoing across time. You’ll resolve them all — except the one that resolves you.

name: Eric
fortune: Behold... the stars shimmer upon the one who questions all things — from font size to pantry layout. The universe sighs, “Not everything needs a redesign.”

name: Fatima
fortune: The spirits hand you the sacred scroll of testing. You’ll find a bug that breaks reality — and the devs will call it a feature.

name: Hank
fortune: The universe loops endlessly, and so shall you. You’ll discover the meaning of life inside a nested loop.

name: James
fortune: ChathGPT sees your future... An undefined variable will ruin your week and your faith in humanity.

name: Jasmine
fortune: The cosmic linter smiles on you, young one. Your upcoming pull requests shall be legendary with feedback like you've never seen before

name: Kenny
fortune: The crystal ball sees your keyboard glowing with quiet pride. You’ll fix a bug so elegant, no one believes it was ever broken.

name: Khaldoon
fortune: The planets gather in retrospective. You’ve tried to apply Scrum to world peace — the sprint goal remains ambitious, and the backlog infinite.

name: Jo-ey
fortune: The crystal ball gazes into the future… your masterpiece shines, balanced, divine — and then marketing will ask to make the logo bigger and add one more paragraph

name: Joey
fortune: The crystal ball gazes into the future… your masterpiece shines, balanced, divine — and then marketing will ask to make the logo bigger and add one more paragraph

name: Markus
fortune: The crystal ball reveals a dog cage emerging from the shadows. It seeks release, not attention. Set it free, and balance will be restored

name: Megat
fortune: The crystal ball gazes into the future...your code will work perfectly always but, only on your machine.

name: Ikhlas
fortune: You will be the chosen one… to refactor legacy code until 2042.

name: Faiz
fortune: The prophecy says: ‘One test shall fail without reason.’ Good luck finding that reason

name: Samim
fortune: The branches converge under a blood moon. You will merge — but the conflicts will find you.

name: Nadiy
fortune: You will craft words that move hearts — and still be asked to include more hashtags.

name: Nadiyshyaa
fortune: You will craft words that move hearts — and still be asked to include more hashtags.

name: Navin
fortune: The console speaks in riddles tonight. Your debugger shall reveal not truth, but despair.

name: Nic
fortune: The balance sheets shimmer under cosmic light. The universe balances — except the accounts. The numbers will mock you gently.

name: Niezwan
fortune: The code whispers... you will find inner peace... right after your zus order arrives and the TOMP stops upgrading to the next version.

name: Wan
fortune: The code whispers... you will find inner peace... right after your zus order arrives and the TOMP stops upgrading to the next version.

name: Izzie
fortune: Behold... the cosmic balance tilts as milk carton No. 4 strays from its rightful spot. The universe seeks the milk thief, and soon you must choose — to forgive or to forget. Be mindful, for one path leads to inner peace, while the other invites quiet despair.

name: Nurul
fortune: Beware of the retrograde sprint; it brings scope creep disguised as feedback... and your cat will agree

name: Shane
fortune: The sensors flicker... you are destined to ship great code — but only if your Zus order arrives before stand-up.

name: Thisura
fortune: The moonlight drips in perfect contrast. You will chase perfection in pixels — yet destiny shall favor the rough draft.

name: Titi
fortune: Your analytics dashboard becomes self-aware and starts judging you.

name: Vignnesh
fortune: Your stars are entangled in chats with Vicky and late-night commits.

name: Gabb
fortune: A great revelation shall come to you in the shower… and you will forget it before you find your towel.

name: Natasha
fortune: Three socks will enter the washing machine. Two shall return. The third begins a new life in another dimension.

name: Wendy
fortune: Your reflection has something to tell you, but it’s waiting for better lighting.

name: Nurin
fortune: Happiness arrives when you stop trying to make sense of horoscopes written by AI.

name: Rocio
fortune: The truth you seek is probably hidden in your spam folder.

name: Halina
fortune: The truth you seek is probably hidden in your spam folder.

name: Jakub
fortune: The path ahead is bright — mostly from the glare of your screen as you Google how to do the task you just said you understood..

name: Darren
fortune: Behold... the universe observes your confidence. Yet remember, confident one: when you walk into non booked meetings rooms, you will be judged by the rest..

name: Joan
fortune: A notification will come at midnight. Do not open it. It is only ClickUp… pretending to care.

name: Hubert
fortune: The stars align... you’ll discover the meaning of life inside a nested loop.

name: Sofia
fortune: Beware of overthinking; you already have enough tabs opened.

name: Shifarah
fortune: ChathGPT sees that your charm opens doors, yet the client still wants a discount.

name: Fabien
fortune: The quantum fog clears...a bright future awaits you -- a day will come when you dont run your responses through ChatGPT

name: Kaz
fortune: You shall find a typo in the Scrum Bible… and question everything you’ve ever believed

name: Ganesh
fortune: You’ll remove all blockers, except the emotional ones
